headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Executions Delayed for Eight Inmates

snippet: The State Supreme Court on Tuesday delayed indefinitely the scheduled executions of eight prisoners who challenged a law that kept secret some information about lethal injection drugs.
abstract: Arkansas Supreme Court delays execution of eight inmates on death row, holding that those sentenced to death have a constitutional right to know details of the injections they are going to be administered.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court on Tuesday delayed indefinitely the scheduled executions of eight prisoners who challenged a law that kept secret some information about lethal injection drugs.
